NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: I have made a grave mistake. 2 1 CASSAVA: The native life of Timber Hearth are amphibious! And the geysers populating the pools they live in erupt them from the safety of the water.. The entire species is already on the brink of... 3 1 CASSAVA: I was too blinded by my own grief... No, no! I must take action to save those who are left before it is too late! 4 3 CASSAVA: I.. I have quarantined those who remained safely within the Sanctuary. But they cannot remain there indefinitely... 5 3 CASSAVA: I must launch the Inspired at once to capture all available ghost matter on Timber Hearth. 6 5 CASSAVA: But after that.. What will I do..? Deep Storm Station ENTERED 1 Stowaways DSS 4 5
